CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1969, pg. 8, reads: "Seeing Double - Although she may sound like two people, there is only one Nina Simone, the 'High Priestess of Soul,' who wove her magical spell over a small but appreciative audience in ballroom of the Hilton Hotel last Friday night. The occasion was the last of the current season of Walt Harper Jazz Workshops.  It could have been the flu or lack of money after the heavy Christmas shopping spending that held down the crowd.  But those on hand enjoyed a rare musical treat.  Miss Simone was superb.  And so was the Walt Harper Quintet which played for dancing between shows. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Nina Simone singing and playing piano, on stage of Hilton Hotel ballroom, horizontal format
